loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition '(i != 5)' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition '(i != 5)' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition '(i != 5)' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'i (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'i (line 4)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'i = 0;' be considered dead code?
